books.author: by George W. Bush
books.description: The 43rd president’s portrait of his father, George H. W. Bush, the 41st.

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the strange death of Gen. George S. Patton in December 1945.
books.name: KILLING PATTON

books.author: by Amy Poehler
books.description: A humorous miscellany from the comedian and actress, the “Saturday Night Live” alumna and star of “Parks and Recreation.”
books.name: YES PLEASE

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Andy Cohen
books.description: One year in the (social) life of the TV producer and host of “Watch What Happens Live.”
books.name: THE ANDY COHEN DIARIES

books.author: by Brooke Shields
books.description: A memoir of the actress’s life and her complicated relationship with her ambitious, difficult mother.
books.name: THERE WAS A LITTLE GIRL

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Glenn Beck with Kevin Balfe
books.description: More little-known stories from America’s past; a follow-up to “Miracles and Massacres.”
books.name: DREAMERS AND DECEIVERS

books.author: by Al Michaels with L. Jon Wertheim
books.description: The veteran sportscaster, the voice of “Sunday Night Football,” recalls players and games he has observed.
books.name: YOU CAN'T MAKE THIS UP

books.author: by Lena Dunham
books.description: A collection of revealing and often humorous personal essays from the creator and star of “Girls.”
books.name: NOT THAT KIND OF GIRL

books.author: by Anne Lamott
books.description: Essays about forgiveness, transformation and grace.
books.name: SMALL VICTORIES

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: Scientific (but often humorous) answers to hypothetical questions, based in part on the author’s website, xkcd.com.
books.name: WHAT IF?

books.author: by Vince M. Bertram
books.description: How to help American students who are falling behind in science, technology, engineering and math education.
books.name: ONE NATION UNDER TAUGHT
